metadata.name: Passport To Mars: Deep Space
metadata.description:
The Algarnon Galactic Expedition has issued 1000 Passports To Mars in order to provide safe refuge for intergalactic Algarnon.
The Passport To Mars is a luxurious NFT that will grant you exclusive 'Mars Citizen' status within the Algarnon Discord Community.
Holders of the Mars Passport will also be entered into a once-in-a-lifetime Prize Draw which will be initiated after all 1000 Passports are acquired.
In order to be eligible for the Prize Draw, you MUST be a member of the Algarnon Discord and a Resident within the 'Mars Citizen' discord channel: https://discord.gg/Algarnon
Upon Joining the Discord, please state the following 'Mars Citizen 101' in the General Chat.
If for some reason your Discord Invite does not work, please contact us on Twitter by sending a DM or tweet to @TheAlgarnon
